name: UpdateItemModifierLists
description:
Update modifier lists for a catalog item.

This tool updates the CatalogModifierList objects for a specific CatalogItem without needing a complete item upsert. Call this tool when you need to modify which modifier lists apply to an item in your catalog.

parameters.name: catalog_item_ids
parameters.description: A list of catalog item IDs associated with the CatalogModifierList objects to update.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the catalog items associated with the CatalogModifierList objects being updated.

parameters.name: modifier_list_ids_to_enable
parameters.description: The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to enable for the CatalogItem. At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

value_schema.description:
The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to enable for the CatalogItem.
At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

parameters.name: modifier_list_ids_to_disable
parameters.description: The IDs of CatalogModifierList objects to disable for the CatalogItem. At least one of this or modifier_lists_to_enable must be specified.

value_schema.description:
The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to disable for the CatalogItem.
At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: item_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the catalog items associated with the CatalogModifierList objects being updated.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the catalog items associated with the CatalogModifierList objects being updated.

parameters.name: modifier_lists_to_enable
parameters.description:
The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to enable for the CatalogItem.
At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

value_schema.description:
The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to enable for the CatalogItem.
At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

parameters.name: modifier_lists_to_disable
parameters.description:
The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to disable for the CatalogItem.
At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

value_schema.description:
The IDs of the CatalogModifierList objects to disable for the CatalogItem.
At least one of `modifier_lists_to_enable` or `modifier_lists_to_disable` must be specified.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
